title: Telemetry Ingestion
description: Collect and store metrics, logs, events, and traces from all systems with OpenTelemetry support.

title: NRQL Dashboards
description: Create powerful dashboards with New Relic Query Language (NRQL) to visualize key metrics.

title: Frontend Monitoring
description: Monitor page load times, JavaScript errors, and user sessions for real UX insights.

title: Infrastructure Monitoring
description: Get deep visibility into host performance, containers, and cloud-native services.
